CustomField.description: Automated lifecycle status for the subscription. Calculates 'Expired', 'Expiring Soon' (within 30 days), or 'Active' based on the End Date without manual user intervention.
CustomField.formula: IF( End_Date__c < TODAY(), "Expired", IF( End_Date__c - TODAY() <= 30, "Expiring Soon", "Active" ) )
CustomField.label: Status
